TermDefinition.DefinitionText: An anticancer drug that is a type of angiogenesis inhibitor.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "dextromethorphan acetic acid"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "ácido acético con dextrometorfano"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento contra el cáncer que es un tipo de inhibidor de la angiogénesis.
